content.body:
## Shop 235/45R18 Tire Size 235/45R18 tires are used on a wide variety of sedans such as the Hyundai Sonata, Lexus ES350, Porsche 718 Boxster, Tesla Model 3, Toyota, Avalon, Volkswagen Passat, Volvo S60, or Kia Optima. A brand new version of any of these vehicles might roll out of the factory with a set of [Pirelli P Zero All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero-all-season), Bridgestone Turanza EL440, Goodyear Eagle F1 Asymmetric 2, Michelin Primacy MXM4, Falken Sincera SN250A A/S, Continental ProContact TX, or Kumho Solus XC KU26 tires attached thanks to their ability to perform well year-round. Popular vehicles: 2015-2021 Hyundai Sonata
2019-2021 Lexus ES350
2017-2021 Porsche 718 Boxster
2017-2021 Tesla Model 3
2019-2021 Toyota Avalon
2012-2021 Volkswagen Passat Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. If you’re looking for a new set of 235/45R18 all-season tires that aren’t original equipment, check out the Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, Firestone Champion Fuel Fighter, [Nokian One](https://simpletire.com/brands/nokian-tires/one), or General Altimax RT43 for great performance year-round. Drivers of sportier cars like the Porsche 718 Boxster or Tesla Model 3 often use ultra-high-performance tires in warmer weather to bring out the racing-inspired handling of their ride. Check out the [>Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Toyo Proxes 4 Plus, BFGoodrich g-Force COMP-2 A/S+, or Yokohama Advan Sport V105 if you’re looking for a set of 235/45R18 tires that can push the limits of your 718 Boxster or Model 3. Winter weather often brings ice, slush, snow, and lower temperatures with it, which makes it more difficult for your tires to grip the road. All-season tires can perform in these conditions, but their rubber compound stiffens up in colder temperatures which hinders grip. If you live in an area that gets heavy ice and snow, you might want to consider winter tires like the Pirelli Ice Zero FR, [Blizzak WS90](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/blizzak-ws90), Hankook Winter i cept evo2 (W320), or Falken Eurowinter HS449 to help you get through ice, slush, snow, and frozen roads. Whether you drive a Hyundai Sonata, Porsche 718 Boxster, Toyota Avalon, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 235/45R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
